mapper.insert: insert into member (email, password, name, role, zipcode, addr1, addr2) values(#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{role}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2})
mapper.select: select member_id, email, password, name, role, zipcode, addr1, addr2 from member where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.update: update member set password = #{password}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2} where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: select member_id, email, password, name, role, zipcode, addr1, addr2 from member where member_id > 0 order by member_id asc
select member_id, email, password, name, role, zipcode, addr1, addr2 from member where email = #{email}
